title: AP Ashe Mid is disgusting.
body:
Ulting someone for 2k raw damage and then following up with a lich baned nashors auto for another 600 raw damage? disgusting absolutely disgusting.

I love it.

replies.body: It's funny how she was even able to get those items considering how easy she is to kill.
Im the one who got the items.
I thought cdr was capped at 40?
theres a mastery option called intelligence in the cunning tree which will increase cdr cap to 45%

If you're into crazy ADC off meta AP burst, try Tristana and Corki next. Also Jhin might be good when he comes out.

BTW don't listen to these haters in the comments. It's people like you who create the next meta, experimentation away from the meta is crucial. You're on a noble path son :D
Im pretty stoked for jhin actually, gonna science his ass.
Yi jungle might be a problem tho ðŸ˜‚
It sucks and your match history proves it
